html.p: Highly scalable app data storage and retrieval capabilities for developers.

With Splunk 6.2, App developers can now make use of the App Key Value Store to persist data associated with their applications. The common uses for the K/V Store are to both enrich machine data within Splunk Apps and a variety of other scenarios which require persistence of Splunk App specific information.

ul.li: Highly flexible, secure and scalable storage and retrieval capabilities.
Ability to create, update and query data collections using a rich set of REST APIs.
Ability to use the existing Splunk lookup commands (inputlookup, etc.) against data in the App value key store.
Enforce Splunkâ€™s Role-based access control to data in the App key value store.
Monitoring and management dashboards to understand the performance characteristics of the App key value store.
